attributes.action: Enforce all travellers entering the UK to have a covid free certificate
attributes.additional_details: Too many cases of covid entering the UK.
attributes.background: At the moment anyone leaving the UK needs to pay £200-£250 for a Covid test and certificate to prove they are covid free. Prior to travelling. The same should apply for people entering the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564229
